title: Does anyone know a similar font to Snell Roundhand? I just hate paying so much for a font when there may be something similar.
content: I only want to use this one time for my Granddaughter's graduation invitations....
author: GloSmith

comments.content:
Does she know you think $29 is too much?

The good news is: you can use it again.

hhp
[edited] With Microsoft Office, there is Edwardian script.
SHE thinks it's too much for a grandmother who has already supported her through school while struggling.... WHEN she could just have a FREE font. Thanks for your concern though.

Then it's probable you should compromise on your font choice. Or this might be a good opportunity to teach a young person about the value of hard work (which font design very much involves). Because most font designers are in the same financial boat as you, and you need to understand the essential problem with your request, especially in a place dedicated to type designers. Just because you can get something for free doesn't make it a good idea in the overall.

And let me ask you: what are some ~$30 items you have bought for her recently?

hhp
